datasets.name: 2179784c
queryLines:
WITH
-- apply date filter
usage_with_ws_filtered_by_date AS (
  SELECT
    w.workspace_id,
    w.workspace_name,
    w.workspace_url,
    u.usage_quantity,
    u.usage_unit,
    u.sku_name,
    u.usage_end_time,
    u.cloud
  FROM
    system.billing.usage AS u NATURAL JOIN system.access.workspaces_latest AS w
  WHERE
    YEAR(u.usage_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND month(u.usage_date) = month(CURRENT_DATE())
),
-- calc list priced usage in USD
prices_list AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(price_end_time, DATE_ADD(current_date, 1)) AS coalesced_price_end_time,
    *
  FROM
    system.billing.list_prices
  WHERE
    currency_code = 'USD'
),
prices_contract AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(price_end_time, DATE_ADD(current_date, 1)) AS coalesced_price_end_time,
    *
  FROM
    system.billing.account_prices
  WHERE
    currency_code = 'USD'
),
list_priced_usd AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(u.usage_quantity * coalesce(pc.pricing.default,lp.pricing.promotional.default,lp.pricing.default, 0),0) as usage_usd,
    u.usage_quantity as usage_DBU,
    u.*
  FROM
    usage_with_ws_filtered_by_date as u
      LEFT JOIN prices_list AS lp
        ON u.sku_name = lp.sku_name
        AND u.cloud = lp.cloud
        AND u.usage_unit = lp.usage_unit
        AND (u.usage_end_time BETWEEN lp.price_start_time AND lp.coalesced_price_end_time)
      LEFT JOIN prices_contract AS pc
        ON u.sku_name = pc.sku_name
        AND u.cloud = pc.cloud
        AND u.usage_unit = pc.usage_unit
        AND (u.usage_end_time BETWEEN pc.price_start_time AND pc.coalesced_price_end_time)
)
-- calc total usage in USD
SELECT
  workspace_id,
  workspace_name,
  workspace_url,
  round(sum(usage_usd), 2) AS usage_usd,
  round(sum(usage_DBU), 2) AS usage_DBU
FROM
  list_priced_usd
GROUP BY
  1,
  2,
  3
ORDER BY
  4 DESC;

datasets.name: fca00fa3
queryLines:
WITH
-- apply date filter
usage_with_ws_filtered_by_date AS (
  SELECT
    w.workspace_id,
    w.workspace_name,
    w.workspace_url,
    u.usage_quantity,
    u.usage_unit,
    u.sku_name,
    u.usage_end_time,
    u.cloud
  FROM
    system.billing.usage AS u NATURAL JOIN system.access.workspaces_latest AS w
  WHERE
    YEAR(u.usage_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND month(u.usage_date) = month(CURRENT_DATE()) and w.workspace_id = dataops_prd.libs.get_workspace_id()
),
-- calc list priced usage in USD
prices_list AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(price_end_time, DATE_ADD(current_date, 1)) AS coalesced_price_end_time,
    *
  FROM
    system.billing.list_prices
  WHERE
    currency_code = 'USD'
),
prices_contract AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(price_end_time, DATE_ADD(current_date, 1)) AS coalesced_price_end_time,
    *
  FROM
    system.billing.account_prices
  WHERE
    currency_code = 'USD'
),
list_priced_usd AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(u.usage_quantity * coalesce(pc.pricing.default,lp.pricing.promotional.default,lp.pricing.default, 0),0) as usage_usd,
    u.usage_quantity as usage_DBU,
    u.*
  FROM
    usage_with_ws_filtered_by_date as u
      LEFT JOIN prices_list AS lp
        ON u.sku_name = lp.sku_name
        AND u.cloud = lp.cloud
        AND u.usage_unit = lp.usage_unit
        AND (u.usage_end_time BETWEEN lp.price_start_time AND lp.coalesced_price_end_time)
      LEFT JOIN prices_contract AS pc
        ON u.sku_name = pc.sku_name
        AND u.cloud = pc.cloud
        AND u.usage_unit = pc.usage_unit
        AND (u.usage_end_time BETWEEN pc.price_start_time AND pc.coalesced_price_end_time)
)
-- calc total usage in USD
SELECT
  workspace_id,
  workspace_name,
  workspace_url,
  round(sum(usage_usd), 2) AS usage_usd,
  round(sum(usage_DBU), 2) AS usage_DBU
FROM
  list_priced_usd
GROUP BY
  1,
  2,
  3
ORDER BY
  4 DESC;

datasets.name: 98832da7
datasets.displayName: most used node types in workspace
queryLines:
with node_counts as
(SELECT
    driver_node_type as node_type, 1 as node_count
  FROM
    system.compute.clusters
WHERE 
workspace_id = dataops_prd.libs.get_workspace_id()
UNION ALL
SELECT
    worker_node_type as node_type, coalesce(worker_count,max_autoscale_workers) as node_count
  FROM
    system.compute.clusters
WHERE workspace_id = dataops_prd.libs.get_workspace_id()
)
select node_type, sum(node_count) as count
FROM
    node_counts
GROUP BY ALL
ORDER BY count DESC

datasets.name: c7ffa25d
datasets.displayName: most used node type not associated with pools
queryLines:
with node_counts as
(SELECT
    driver_node_type as node_type, 1 as node_count
  FROM
    system.compute.clusters
WHERE 
workspace_id = dataops_prd.libs.get_workspace_id() AND driver_instance_pool_id is null
UNION ALL
SELECT
    worker_node_type as node_type, coalesce(worker_count,max_autoscale_workers) as node_count
  FROM
    system.compute.clusters
WHERE workspace_id = dataops_prd.libs.get_workspace_id() and worker_instance_pool_id is null
)
select node_type, sum(node_count) as count
FROM
    node_counts
GROUP BY ALL
ORDER BY count DESC

datasets.name: da048cc6
queryLines:
with node_info as (

select cluster_id
, driver_node_type
, worker_node_type
, case when worker_count is null then max_autoscale_workers else worker_count end as worker_count
, change_time as change_time_start
, coalesce(lead(change_time) over (partition by cluster_id order by change_time),current_timestamp()) as change_time_end
from system.compute.clusters c
),
core_count as ( 
select distinct 
  u.usage_start_time
, u.usage_end_time
, u.usage_date
, u.usage_metadata.cluster_id,
c.driver_node_type,
c.worker_node_type,
c.worker_count,
c.change_time_start,
c.change_time_end
, driver_nt.core_count as driver_core_count
, worker_nt.core_count * c.worker_count  as worker_core_count,
driver_nt.core_count + (worker_nt.core_count * c.worker_count) as total_core_count
from system.billing.usage u
left join node_info c
ON u.usage_metadata.cluster_id = c.cluster_id and u.usage_start_time between c.change_time_start and c.change_time_end
left join system.compute.node_types driver_nt ON c.driver_node_type = driver_nt.node_type
left join system.compute.node_types worker_nt ON c.worker_node_type = worker_nt.node_type
where u.usage_metadata.cluster_id is not null
),
costs as
(select
 date_format(usage_date, 'yyyyMM') as yearmonth,
 sum(usage_quantity * list_prices.pricing.default) as list_cost
from system.billing.usage t1
INNER JOIN system.billing.account_prices list_prices
  on t1.cloud = list_prices.cloud
  and t1.sku_name = list_prices.sku_name
  and t1.usage_start_time >= list_prices.price_start_time
  and (t1.usage_end_time <= list_prices.price_end_time or list_prices.price_end_time is null)
group by all
order by 1 asc),
month_cores as (
select date_format(usage_date, 'yyyyMM') as usage_date, sum(total_core_count) core_count
from core_count
group by all
order by 1 asc)
select month_cores.usage_date, month_cores.core_count, costs.list_cost
from month_cores
inner join costs
on month_cores.usage_date = costs.yearmonth

datasets.name: c1566699
datasets.displayName: custo de jobs rodando em all purpose
queryLines:
with 
costs_temp as (
  select 
  t1.workspace_id,
  t1.usage_metadata.job_id as job_id,
  date_format(t1.usage_date,"yyyyMM") as yyyyMM,
  sum(usage_quantity * list_prices.pricing.default) as list_cost
  from system.billing.usage t1
INNER JOIN system.billing.account_prices list_prices
  on t1.cloud = list_prices.cloud
  and t1.sku_name = list_prices.sku_name
  and t1.usage_start_time >= list_prices.price_start_time
  and (t1.usage_end_time <= list_prices.price_end_time or list_prices.price_end_time is null)
GROUP BY ALL
),
clusters AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY workspace_id, cluster_id ORDER BY change_time DESC) as rn
  FROM system.compute.clusters
  WHERE cluster_source="UI"
  QUALIFY rn=1
),
job_tasks_exploded AS (
  SELECT
    workspace_id,
    job_id,
    EXPLODE(compute_ids) as cluster_id
  FROM system.lakeflow.job_task_run_timeline
),
all_purpose_cluster_jobs AS (
  SELECT
    t1.*,
    t2.cluster_name,
    t2.owned_by,
    t2.dbr_version
  FROM job_tasks_exploded t1 
    INNER JOIN clusters t2 USING (workspace_id, cluster_id)
),
most_recent_jobs as (
  SELECT 
    *, 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY workspace_id, job_id ORDER BY change_time DESC) as rn
  FROM
    system.lakeflow.jobs QUALIFY rn=1
)
SELECT distinct
  t3.*
FROM all_purpose_cluster_jobs t1 
  LEFT JOIN most_recent_jobs t2 USING (workspace_id, job_id)
  LEFT JOIN costs_temp t3 USING (workspace_id, job_id)
GROUP BY all
ORDER BY all DESC

datasets.name: ba7e08d9
queryLines:
select
 date_format(usage_date, 'yyyyMM') as yearmonth,
 sum(usage_quantity * list_prices.pricing.default) as list_cost
from system.billing.usage t1
INNER JOIN system.billing.account_prices list_prices
  on t1.cloud = list_prices.cloud
  and t1.sku_name = list_prices.sku_name
  and t1.usage_start_time >= list_prices.price_start_time
  and (t1.usage_end_time <= list_prices.price_end_time or list_prices.price_end_time is null)
where t1.sku_name like '%ALL%'
group by all
order by 1 desc

from system.billing.usage t1

group by all
order by 1 desc

frame.title: most used node types not in pools
